item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is Already a Massive Success
item.description:
Summary

  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 sold over one million copies on launch day, surpassing its predecessor in both reviews and sales.
  • The sequel has outperformed the original game in terms of concurrent player count on Steam and ranks 12th on the US PlayStation Store.
  • Warhorse Studios is already planning multiple DLCs and free post-launch content for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is already shaping up to be a resounding success, having sold more than one million copies in just a day of launch. Developed by Warhorse Studios, Kingdom Come: Deliverance came out to a flood of positive reviews on February 4 on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

Taking players back to the 15th-century Kingdom of Bohemia, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 tells the next chapter of Henry's story, who is the main protagonist retained from the first game. Similar to the 2018 original, which landed on Switch in March 2024, the open-world action RPG aims to recreate its Renaissance-era setting with historical accuracy in mind and features a range of real-world figures from the past. Amid much anticipation, the first-person title rolled out to major critical success, currently boasting an overall average score of 89 on OpenCritic. And, it has now been revealed that the game's impressive reviews have come coupled with strong sales numbers.

On Twitter, Warhorse Studios announced that Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 had amassed "over a million" players within 24 hours of launch. In comparison, its predecessor took nine days to reach the same milestone following a mixed reception. In other words, the sequel has not only outperformed Kingdom Come: Deliverance in terms of reviews but also in the context of commercial performance so far. This feat looks especially remarkable, keeping in mind that the Deep Silver-published game isn't currently available on the PlayStation Store in Saudi Arabia, despite the Warhorse Studios co-founder denying rumors of a ban.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Sales Soar Along with its Popularity Across Platforms

It's worth noting that Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is doing significantly well in terms of concurrent player count. On Steam, the single-player title has a peak count of 168,936 players at the time of writing, per SteamDB. This figure is well beyond the peak of 96,069 players achieved by the original on the Valve-owned platform. In addition to that, the game currently also ranks 12th among the top PlayStation games in the US, as seen on the PS Store homepage. Given that the Kingdom Come: Deliverance sequel is also available on Xbox, it's safe to assume that even more players are logging into the game than the publicly visible metrics show.

As players dive deep into the immersive world of Bohemia, Warhorse Studios devs are already working on Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 's future content. In January 2025, they revealed that the historical game is scheduled to get multiple DLCs as well as other free post-launch content.

item.title: The Sims 4: Blast From the Past Week 1 Quests
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Start Blast From the Past Event Quests
  • How to Complete The Sims 4 A Strange Visitor Quests
  • How to Complete The Sims 4 Missing Clues Quests
  • Rewards For Completing the Week 1 Blast From the Past Quests

The Sims 4 has hosted two events, and it's been an absolute success so far. During the weeks that an event is live, gamers get to complete lots of quests, which keep them busy, incentivize them to try different features of The Sims 4 , and even give them a fun storyline to follow.

The newest Sims 4 event is called the Blast From the Past event, and it'll be live until March 18, so gamers have about a month and a half to complete its four sets of quests and unlock all sorts of fun, nostalgic rewards.

How to Start Blast From the Past Event Quests

Not long after loading into a save file in The Sims 4 , a pop-up will appear on the player's screen talking about "A Strange Visitor", and this will initiate the Blast From the Past event.

Gamers who aren't being met with this message upon opening a save file will want to make sure that they have Delivery Express turned on in Settings.

How to Complete The Sims 4 A Strange Visitor Quests

Here is how to complete all of the A Strange Visitor Quests in The Sims 4 :

Tune In to the News for 15 Minutes

To complete this quest, players have to interact with a TV and select the "Watch News" option in the "Watch Channel" menu. After 15 in-game minutes, a report about a time traveler named Emit Relevart will come on, and here is where the investigation begins.

Check Emit's Social Media Profile

To check Emit Relevart's social media profile in The Sims 4 , gamers have to interact with a computer and select the "Check Emit's Profile" option in the "Social Network" menu. This will provide useful information on Emit, including his likes, beliefs, and physical description.

Ask Other Sims About Emit (3)

Next, players have to go up to three Sims and enquire about Emit. They can do this by clicking on a Sim and selecting the "Ask about Emit" interaction, which will immediately appear on the social pie menu.

Travel to Magnolia Blossom Park in Willow Creek

Rumors will point players to the park in Willow Creek, which is where they must head next.

Introduce Yourself to Emit Relevart

Players shouldn't have too much trouble finding Emit in the park, as his bright blue hair and wears a glowing blue outfit. Gamers have to approach Emit and introduce themselves to complete this quest.

Ask Emit Relevart About the Missing Items

Gamers will find this social interaction in the main interactions menu, so they only have to click on Emit in order to spot him.

Ask Other Sims About Missing Items (3)

While at the park, gamers will want to go up to three random Sims and ask them if they know any information about missing items.

How to Complete The Sims 4 Missing Clues Quests

Players will receive the Missing Clue Quests once they've completed the A Strange Visitor Quests.

Refresh Your Memory in The Sims Archives

Players can check out The Sims Archives in The Sims 4 by interacting with any computer and selecting "Play The Sims Archives" in the "Play Game" menu. Here, they will play The Sims 1 and learn more about this mystery.

Find the Special Time Capsule

If gamers want to find the Special Time Capsule in The Sims 4 , they have to search in an area with a lot of dirt and open space. A great location for finding Time Capsules is the Foundry Cove district in Willow Creek.

Open the Special Time Capsule

After finding the Special Time Capsule, players can open it by finding it in their inventory.

Read the IOU

It turns out that a strange IOU note was left in the time capsule, and gamers must read it in order to get more information.

Report Back to Emit

Next, players will have to return to Magnolia Bloom to talk to Emit. If they have trouble spotting him, they are known acquainted so they can simply select his profile in the Relationships tab and click the "Focus Camera" option.

Accuse Sims of Being Time Travelers (3)

Players must go up to three Sims and select the "Accuse of Being a Time Traveler" social interaction.

Ponder Time Travel

To ponder time travel in The Sims 4 , gamers have to select that interaction after clicking on a shower.

Rewards For Completing the Week 1 Blast From the Past Quests

Players will receive nine items for their efforts in completing the first set of Blast From the Past Quests in The Sims 4 :

  • Retro Deco Phone Set
  • 500 Simoleons
  • Relevart Time Walkers
  • Missing Sim Milk Carton
  • The Yesterday Set
  • 25 Satisfaction Points
  • The Future's So Bright "Sun" Glasses
  • Missing Sim Milk Carton
  • The Fun-Fun Inflatable Set, Part One

item.title: Roblox: Demon Warriors Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Demon Warriors is one of the RPGs based on the Demon Slayer anime. In it, you have to fight waves of demons using different weapons and abilities. With each new wave, the enemies will become stronger and stronger. And, if you want to upgrade your character faster, then Demon Warriors codes are what you need.

Each of these codes can reward you with useful items or currencies, such as Blood Points. The latter are needed to acquire new abilities or stat reroll.

Updated February 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Demon Warriors codes offer valuable rewards that can enhance your gameplay, whether through powerful upgrades or special event items. From Rare Stat Upgrade Gems to seasonal collectibles like Halloween Candy and Christmas Bells, these freebies help you stay ahead. Make sure to redeem them while theyâ€™re active, and check back for more.

All Demon Warriors Codes

Working Demon Warriors Codes

  • RARESTATS - Redeem this code to get a Rare Stat Upgrade Gem
  • HAPPYHALLOWEEN - Redeem this code to get Halloween Event Candy
  • MERRYCHRISTMAS - Redeem this code to get Christmas Event Bells
  • FINALTEST - Redeem this code to get 50 Rare Blood Points
  • BEASTUPD - Redeem this code to get 50 Rare Blood Points

Expired Demon Warriors Codes

There are no expired codes in Demon Warriors . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

As we said, in Demon Warriors , you must fight waves of enemies. At first, they will be quite weak, and you can easily kill them even with your bare hands. But the more waves you survive, the stronger demons will spawn in the arena. Therefore, to defeat them, you will need to increase your stats, learn new abilities, and find new weapons. Fortunately, the game has a way to speed up your progress, namely Demon Warriors codes.

These codes will help you get various currencies and items in just a couple of clicks. The best thing about this is that the redeeming feature is available from the very beginning of the game. But, as always, the codes are active for a limited time. So, you should use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Demon Warriors Codes

Using codes in Demon Warriors is as easy as in other Roblox RPG experiences. And for convenience, we recommend you follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch the Demon Warriors experience.
  • Then, open the settings by clicking on the corresponding gear icon in the upper-right corner of the screen.
  • After that, all you have to do is enter the code and click the Verify button.

If you do everything correctly, you will see a message about receiving your rewards.

How to Get More Demon Warriors Codes

If you don't want to miss out on more free goodies in Demon Warriors , then you should redeem the available Roblox codes as soon as they are released. To do this, players can check the developers' social media, where they post about updates and new codes:

  • Yes Madam Roblox group

item.title: Roblox: Savannah Life Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Savannah Life is a well-made RPG with great graphics, mechanics, and a concept that you don't often find in other Roblox games. Here, you will have to survive as an animal, predator, or herbivore in a huge savannah filled with dangers and other players who can also pose a threat.

To dominate this world, you need to climb the evolutionary ladder from herbivore to predator as quickly as possible, but first you need a lot of currency, which is not easy to get. Luckily, you can redeem Savannah Life codes that will bring you a bunch of freebies, including currency that you can spend on the desired upgrades.

Updated February 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: We just updated this guide with new codes and you can redeem them to get coins. Be sure to bookmark this guide so you don't lose access to a constant source of freebies.

All Savannah Life Codes

Working Savannah Life Codes

  • FREE_PRESENT - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins. (NEW)
  • LONG_NECK - Redeem this code to get 450 Coins. (NEW)
  • MOO_DENG - Redeem this code to get 400 Coins.
  • CUTE_DOG - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.

Expired Savannah Life Codes

  • MUFASA - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.

As mentioned above, redeeming Savannah Life codes will bring you a bunch of useful things that will greatly help you progress in the game, especially if you are a beginner. It's worth noting that each of them has a certain expiration date, so if you don't want to miss out on rewards, redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Codes for Savannah Life

Redeeming Savannah Life codes will not be difficult for you, especially if you have done it before in other Roblox games. But if you're a beginner or don't understand how the Savannah Life redemption system works, here's a step-by-step guide to help you with that:

  • Launch Savannah Life .
  • In the main menu, you will see a list of buttons and options. Among them, interact with the last one which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field where you will need to enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, hit the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Savannah Life Codes

To find more Savannah Life codes, all you need to do is visit the game's official social media. Here, along with other content, developers often share Roblox codes, so be careful not to miss them.

  • Official Savannah Life Roblox group.
  • Official Savannah Life Discord server.
  • Official Savannah Life YouTube channel.

item.title: Roblox: Dodgeball Legends Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dodgeball Legends
  • How to Redeem Dodgeball Legends Codes
  • How to Get More Dodgeball Legends Codes

Dodgeball Legends offers players a classic team game but with many innovations. In addition to catching and throwing the ball, players can also use various special skills to gain an advantage in the match. And to unlock them faster, you need to use Dodgeball Legends codes.

These Roblox codes contain valuable rewards, including coins. This is the main currency for which you can purchase special abilities and crates with customization, so you do not want to miss out on them.

Updated February 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Dodgeball Legends codes offer a great way to stack up Coins, helping you unlock new gear and improve your dodgeball skills. Whether you're just starting out or aiming to dominate the game, these freebies will give you a boost. Grab them while they are still active.

All Dodgeball Legends

Working Dodgeball Legends

  • ELEMENTAL - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • SORRY - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • 6KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • 1MVISITS - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 2,000 Coins

Expired Dodgeball Legends

  • UPDATE - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins
  • 1000LIKES - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins

In Dodgeball Legends , players have to fight in teams of seven people. Instead of weapons, you must use balls, as in the classic dodgeball game. However, in addition to this, players have access to various abilities and balls that can radically change the outcome of the match. But of course, they are unavailable from the beginning of the game. Fortunately, this is quite easy to fix with Dodgeball Legends codes.

These codes are an excellent source of free coins. Just a few of them will be enough for you to be able to purchase new skills or several crates. But it is worth noting that after some time after the release, they expire. Therefore, we do not advise you to delay redeeming them.

How to Redeem Dodgeball Legends Codes

If you are familiar with other Roblox games, then you will easily figure out how to use Dodgeball Legends codes. If this is your first experience, then follow these steps to claim goodies from the developers:

  • Launch Dodgeball Legends .
  • Then, open the settings by clicking on the gear icon.
  • After that, enter the code in the corresponding box and click on the Redeem button to receive the rewards.

How to Get More Dodgeball Legends Codes

You should bookmark this article to get Dodgeball Legends codes as soon as they are released. It will update it as well as other Roblox codes guides found here. Alternatively, you can visit the official developer pages to get all the news about events and updates first-hand.

  • Official InfinityDodgeball Roblox group
  • Official InfinitySports Discord server
